page.title: 09A TYPICAL DAY FOR CATHERINE
page.content: Mum, my human alarm, wakes me at 7.00 a.m. - earlier if I have homework. After climbing out of bed, I wash or shower. At about 7.10 I get dressed and go downstairs to the kitchen, collecting the milk on the way. I usually spend about a quarter of an hour having my breakfast and then talking to my mum, making my lunch whilst I find my bus money. In the 20 minutes between 8.00 and 8.20 I usually practise my flute, piano or dancing and at 8.20 I go to meet my friend who walks to the bus with me. The bus should have come by 8.45; although school starts at 8.55, we don't usually get there until 9.00. We have an hour's lesson after 25 minutes of form time. From 10.30 until 10.45 we have break. {continued on next page}
